burlap.oomdp.auxiliary.stateconditiontest

Class TFGoalCondition

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.oomdp.auxiliary.stateconditiontest.TFGoalCondition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StateConditionTest

    public class TFGoalCondition
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateConditionTest
    A simple StateConditionTest wrapper of TerminalFunciton. Deterministic forward search planners search for goal states that are indicated by StateConditionTest objects. If a TerminalFunction only terminates in goal states, this class can be used to wrap the terminal function to indicate that goal states are any previously defined terminal states.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan
